name: iPhone 15 Pro
details: The iPhone 15 Pro offers a premium experience with a titanium frame, the new A17 Bionic chip, and a stunning 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. Capture stunning photos with the 48MP main camera system, and enjoy incredible performance and battery life.
camera: 48MP Main Camera, 12MP Ultra Wide, 12MP Telephoto, LiDAR Scanner

name: iPhone 14
details: The iPhone 14 delivers an exceptional 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, powered by the A15 Bionic chip. With dual 12MP cameras, including an upgraded Night Mode, and better battery life, it's perfect for all your everyday needs.

name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
details: The iPhone 13 Pro Max features a large 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion for ultra-smooth scrolling. It includes a triple-camera system with a 12MP telephoto lens, perfect for low-light conditions and macro photography.
camera: 12MP Main Camera, 12MP Ultra Wide, 12MP Telephoto, LiDAR Scanner

name: iPhone 13 Mini
details: The iPhone 13 Mini offers a compact design without sacrificing performance. With a 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR display and dual 12MP cameras, it's a perfect fit for those who want the best performance in a small package.

name: iPhone SE (3rd generation)
details: The iPhone SE (3rd generation) offers the same performance as the iPhone 13 with the A15 Bionic chip, all in a compact design. Enjoy great battery life, a 12MP camera, and access to all of Apple's latest features.

name: iPhone 12 Pro Max
details: The iPhone 12 Pro Max delivers superior photography and performance with a 6.7-inch OLED display, A14 Bionic chip, and a 12MP triple-camera system. Ideal for those who want a large screen and top-tier camera quality.
camera: 12MP Main Camera, 12MP Ultra Wide, 12MP Telephoto, LiDAR Scanner
